statements.statements: for $L.x = 1 to lng(4 in $L.patches) do ($L.dbdict=1 in $L.x in 4 in $L.patches;$L.query=3 in $L.x in 4 in $L.patches;$L.addonly=5 in $L.x in 4 in $L.patches;$L.addonly=nullsub($L.addonly, false);$L.exist=jscall("upgradeDataScanHelper.isDbdictExist", $L.dbdict);$L.excluded=jscall("upgradeDataScanHelper.isDbdictExcluded", $L.dbdict);if ($L.exist and not ($L.excluded) and $L.query~="false" and not ($L.addonly)) then ($L.dbdicts=insert($L.dbdicts, 0, 1, $L.dbdict)))

for $L.x = 1 to $L.count do ($L.dbdict=$L.x in $L.dbdicts;$L.void=rtecall("statusupdate", $L.err, "line2", " ");$L.void=rtecall("statusupdate", $L.err, "line3", " ");$L.void=rtecall("statusupdate", $L.err, "line2", "Scanning table: "+$L.dbdict);$L.void=rtecall("statusupdate", $L.err, "line3", ""+$L.scanned+" tables scanned");$L.percent=round($L.scanned/max($L.count, 1)*100);$L.line5=""+str($L.percent)+"% complete.";$L.void=rtecall("statusupdate", $L.err, "line4", $L.line5);$L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1133", {$L.dbdict});$L.total=0;$L.fixed=0;$L.deleted=0;$L.flag1=0;$L.void=rtecall("scantable", $L.flag, 2, $L.dbdict, true, $L.total, $L.fixed, $L.deleted);$L.failed=$L.total - $L.fixed - $L.deleted;$L.failed.count=$L.failed.count+$L.failed;$L.fixed.count=$L.fixed.count+$L.fixed;$L.deleted.count=$L.deleted.count+$L.deleted;if ($L.flag=-1) then ($L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1137", {$L.dbdict});$L.flag1=-1;$L.table.failed=$L.table.failed+1) else (if ($L.flag=0) then ($L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1139", {$L.fixed, $L.deleted, $L.failed});$L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1135", {$L.dbdict})));$L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1134", {$L.dbdict});$L.total=0;$L.fixed=0;$L.deleted=0;$L.void=rtecall("scantable", $L.flag, 3, $L.dbdict, true, $L.total, $L.fixed, $L.deleted);$L.failed=$L.total - $L.fixed - $L.deleted;$L.failed.count=$L.failed.count+$L.failed;$L.fixed.count=$L.fixed.count+$L.fixed;$L.deleted.count=$L.deleted.count+$L.deleted;if ($L.flag=-1) then ($L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1138", {$L.dbdict});if ($L.flag1=0) then ($L.table.failed=$L.table.failed+1)) else (if ($L.flag=0) then ($L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1139", {$L.fixed, $L.deleted, $L.failed});$L.void=jscall("upgradeLog.scDatascan", "1136", {$L.dbdict})));$L.scanned=$L.scanned+1)
